com.company
Class Player

java.lang.Object
  com.company.Player

public class Player
extends java.lang.Object

The Player class is used to represent a human player.

This class provides methods for adding and deleting game characters.

Method Detail

getCharacters

public java.util.ArrayList<Character> getCharacters()
Returns the players characters.

The contents of this property can be modified using the addCharacter and deleteCharacter methods.

Returns:
An ArrayList containing the players characters.

addCharacter

public void addCharacter(Character character)
Add character to players list of characters.

Parameters:
character - An instance of Character which will be added.

deleteCharacter

public void deleteCharacter(Character character)
Delete character from players list of characters, provided it exists. Objects are compared based on the characters name.

Parameters:
character - A Character from the players list of characters.
